title: The Lost Lady (1938 Thriller Film) Directed by Alfred Hitchcock | with Margaret Lockwood

sources.title: The Lost Lady (1938 Thriller Film) Directed by Alfred Hitchcock | with Margaret Lockwood
sources.description:
The Lady Vanishes (alternatively known as The Lost Lady) is a 1938 British mystery thriller film directed by Alfred Hitchcock. Written by Sidney Gilliat & Frank Launder, based on the 1936 novel "The Wheel Spins" by Ethel Lina White.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/-6lNFsLTVZk

Summary: 
While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

Main Actors:
Margaret Lockwood - Iris Henderson
Michael Redgrave - Gilbert
Paul Lukas - Dr. Hartz
May Whitty - Miss Froy
Cecil Parker - Mr. Todhunter
Linden Travers - "Mrs." Todhunter
Naunton Wayne - Caldicott
Basil Radford - Charters
Mary Clare - Baroness
Emile Boreo - Hotel Manager
Googie Withers - Blanche
